special_abilities.Flight: The dragon can fly up to its speed as part of its move.
special_abilities.Fear Aura: The dragon can project a 30-foot radius fear aura as a free action. A creature in the area must succeed on a DC 20 Will save or be affected as though by a fear spell (caster level 10th).
